title: The Birchip Cropping Group
creator_credit: Astrid Scott, David Meagher, Dean Lawry, Jason White and ACMI Content Development
brief_description: A background history of the Birchip Cropping Group, an agricultural research and extension organisation covering the Wimmera Mallee region set up to assist farmers in crop production. Its philosophy is to produce food that is clean, safe and green. Presented by Alexandra, Fiona, James, Simon and the BCG.
